languages.text: {n}Она поднимает на вас взгляд. Темные глаза тревожно мерцают.{/n} "Вольный Торговец. Я молилась. Тьма сгущается вокруг, и нам нужны будут все душевные силы, какие истерзанные сердца смогут отдать".

traits.locale_text: {n}Она поднимает на вас взгляд. Темные глаза тревожно мерцают.{/n} "Вольный Торговец. Я молилась. Тьма сгущается вокруг, и нам нужны будут все душевные силы, какие истерзанные сердца смогут отдать".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}She looks up at you. Her dark eyes gleam anxiously.{/n} "Rogue Trader. You find me at prayer. Darkness surrounds us, and we will require all the spiritual fortitude our ravaged hearts can muster."
languages.original_text: {n}Она поднимает на вас взгляд. Темные глаза тревожно мерцают.{/n} "Вольный Торговец. Я молилась. Тьма сгущается вокруг, и нам нужны будут все душевные силы, какие истерзанные сердца смогут отдать".

traits.locale_text: {n}She looks up at you. Her dark eyes gleam anxiously.{/n} "Rogue Trader. I've been praying. Darkness surrounds us, and our ravaged hearts need to be as strong as they possibly can be."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}She looks up at you. Her dark eyes gleam anxiously.{/n} "Rogue Trader. I've been praying. Darkness surrounds us, and our ravaged hearts need to be as strong as they possibly can be."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}She looks up at you. Her dark eyes gleam anxiously.{/n} "Rogue Trader, I've been praying. Darkness surrounds us and our ravaged hearts need to be as strong as ever."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}She looks up at you. Her dark eyes gleam anxiously.{/n} "Rogue Trader, I've been praying. Darkness surrounds us and our ravaged hearts need to be as strong as ever."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}She looks up at you. Her dark eyes gleam anxiously.{/n} "Rogue Trader. You find me at prayer. Darkness surrounds us, and we will require all the spiritual fortitude our ravaged hearts can muster."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}She looks up at you. Her dark eyes gleam anxiously.{/n} "Rogue Trader. You find me at prayer. Darkness surrounds us, and we will require all the spiritual fortitude our ravaged hearts can muster."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}彼女があなたを見上げる。その瞳は、不安に暗く輝いている。{/n}「自由開拓者よ。私は祈っていた。闇が我々を取り囲んでいるわ。我々の荒れ果てた心を奮起させるために、不屈の心を備えねばならない」
languages.original_text: {n}She looks up at you. Her dark eyes gleam anxiously.{/n} "Rogue Trader. You find me at prayer. Darkness surrounds us, and we will require all the spiritual fortitude our ravaged hearts can muster."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女があなたを見上げる。その瞳は、不安に暗く輝いている。{/n}「自由開拓者よ。私は祈っていた。闇が我々を取り囲んでいるわ。我々の荒れ果てた心を奮起させるために、不屈の心を備えねばならない」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}她抬起头，看着你，深黑色的双眼中闪烁着焦虑的光芒。{/n}“行商浪人，我正在祈祷。黑暗包围了我们，我们的心灵惨遭蹂躏。我们必须想办法再次鼓起勇气。”
languages.original_text: {n}She looks up at you. Her dark eyes gleam anxiously.{/n} "Rogue Trader. You find me at prayer. Darkness surrounds us, and we will require all the spiritual fortitude our ravaged hearts can muster."

traits.locale_text: {n}她抬起头，看着你，深黑色的双眼中闪烁着焦虑的光芒。{/n}“行商浪人，我一直都在祈祷。黑暗包围了我们，尽管我们的心智惨遭蹂躏，但我们要一如既往保持坚强。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Levanta la mirada y ves que sus ojos oscuros brillan con ansiedad.{/n} «Comerciante Independiente, estaba rezando. Nos rodea la oscuridad, por lo que necesitaremos toda la fortaleza espiritual que puedan producir nuestros corazones maltrechos».
languages.original_text: {n}She looks up at you. Her dark eyes gleam anxiously.{/n} "Rogue Trader. You find me at prayer. Darkness surrounds us, and we will require all the spiritual fortitude our ravaged hearts can muster."

traits.locale_text: {n}Te mira. Sus ojos oscuros brillan ansiosos.{/n} «Comerciante Independiente, he estado rezando. La oscuridad nos rodea y nuestros corazones devastados necesitan ser más fuertes que nunca».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sie blickt zu dir auf. Ihre dunklen Augen funkeln nervös.{/n} "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}! Ihr trefft mich betend an. Dunkelheit umgibt uns, und wir werden die ganze spirituelle Kraft brauchen, die unsere geschundenen Herzen aufzubringen vermögen."
languages.original_text: {n}She looks up at you. Her dark eyes gleam anxiously.{/n} "Rogue Trader. You find me at prayer. Darkness surrounds us, and we will require all the spiritual fortitude our ravaged hearts can muster."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie blickt zu dir auf. Ihre dunklen Augen funkeln nervös.{/n} "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, ich bete. Die Dunkelheit umgibt uns, und unsere gepeinigten Herzen müssen stärker sein als je zuvor."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Elle lève la tête vers vous, ses yeux sombres brillants d'angoisse.{/n} « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}. Vous me trouvez en pleine prière. Pour faire face aux ténèbres qui nous entourent, nos cœurs ravagés doivent être animés d'une force inébranlable. »
languages.original_text: {n}She looks up at you. Her dark eyes gleam anxiously.{/n} "Rogue Trader. You find me at prayer. Darkness surrounds us, and we will require all the spiritual fortitude our ravaged hearts can muster."

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle lève la tête vers vous, ses yeux sombres brillants d'angoisse.{/n} « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}. Vous me trouvez en pleine prière. Pour faire face aux ténèbres qui nous entourent, nos cœurs ravagés doivent être animés d'une force inébranlable. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta, başını kaldırıp sana bakıyor. Kara gözlerinden endişe okunuyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir. Dua ediyordum. Etrafımızı karanlık sarmışken perişan yüreklerimizde bulabildiğimiz tüm manevi kudrete ihtiyacımız olacak."
languages.original_text: {n}She looks up at you. Her dark eyes gleam anxiously.{/n} "Rogue Trader. You find me at prayer. Darkness surrounds us, and we will require all the spiritual fortitude our ravaged hearts can muster."

traits.locale_text: {n}Başını kaldırıp sana bakıyor. Kara gözlerinden endişe okunuyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir. Dua ediyordum. Etrafımızı karanlık sarmışken perişan yüreklerimizde bulabildiğimiz tüm manevi kudrete ihtiyacımız olacak."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
